mapper.select: SELECT target_id AS targetId, target_field AS targetField, content FROM `fulltextindex_content_${moduleId}` WHERE target_id in #{k}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `fulltextindex_field_${moduleId}` (`id`, `word_id`, `target_field`, `target_id`, `counter`) VALUES (#{fieldVo.id}, #{fieldVo.wordId}, #{fieldVo.targetField}, #{fieldVo.targetId}, #{fieldVo.counter}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `word_id` = #{fieldVo.wordId}, `target_field` = #{fieldVo.targetField}, `target_id` = #{fieldVo.targetId}, `counter` = #{fieldVo.counter}

INSERT INTO `fulltextindex_content_${moduleId}` (`target_id`, `target_field`, `content`) VALUES (#{contentVo.targetId}, #{contentVo.targetField}, #{contentVo.content,typeHandler=CompressHandler}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `content` = #{contentVo.content,typeHandler=CompressHandler}
mapper.delete: DELETE a,b,c,d FROM fulltextindex_target_${moduleId} a LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_field_${moduleId} b ON a.target_id = b.target_id LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_offset_${moduleId} c ON b.`id` = c.field_id LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_content_${moduleId} d ON a.target_id = d.target_id WHERE a.`target_type` = #{type}

DELETE a,b,c,d FROM fulltextindex_target_${moduleId} a LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_field_${moduleId} b ON a.target_id = b.target_id LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_offset_${moduleId} c ON b.`id` = c.field_id LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_content_${moduleId} d ON a.target_id = d.target_id WHERE a.`target_id` = #{fullTextIndexVo.targetId} and a.`target_type` = #{fullTextIndexVo.targetType}
